Rules.InvariantScript:
Table(
    {
        Title: "Statistics",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: stats,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true
    },
    {
        Title: "Job Tracking",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: tracking,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true        
    },
    {
        Title: "Form Receipts",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: receive,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true               
    },
    {
        Title: "Form Entry",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: 'data-entry',
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true               
    },
    {
        Title: "Job Status",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: status,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true               
    },
    {
        Title: "Reporting",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: report,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true       
    },
    {
        Title: "Admin",
        Screen: App.ActiveScreen,
        Image: admin,
        BarColor: Color.Orange,
        Visability: true               
    }
)
